column1: Smoque BBQ////I had a pulled pork platter
column2: which came with an ample amount of pork. an extra side of sauce and 'slaw and 2 sides. The slaw was okay
column3: but you may find that the two sides are a bit smaller than you may think. I had the mac and cheese
column4: and the cornbread. Both were excellent
column5: but a bit undersized considering you just forked over about 2 Lincolns.
